General.Name: VWF Bancorp Inc.
General.Description: VWF Bancorp, Inc. operates as the holding company for Van Wert Federal Savings Bank that primarily engages in originating loans and accepting deposits in Van Wert, Ohio. The company's deposit products include non-interest bearing and interest-bearing demand accounts, savings accounts, checking accounts, individual retirement accounts, and certificates of deposit. Its loan portfolio consists primarily of one- to four-family residential mortgage loans, as well as commercial real estate loans, agricultural real estate loans, construction and land loans, commercial and industrial loans, home equity lines of credit, and consumer loans. The company was founded in 1889 and is based in Van Wert, Ohio.
General.Address: 976 South Shannon Street, Van Wert, OH, United States, 45891
